thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 15 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Xinlong Holding Group sees FY 2017 net profit up 103 pct to 118 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Xinlong Holding Group sees FY 2017 net profit up 103 pct to 118 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - xinlong holding group co ltd

text:
Jan 16(Reuters) - Xinlong Holding Group Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 103 percent to 118 percent, or to be 65 million yuan to 70 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 32.1 million yuan
* The reasons for the forecast are good performance of non-woven main business and contribution of investment return Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/qdNeyD Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
